Mr. Angel

Ano: 2013

IMDb ID: tt2387132

Classificação: 6.7

Sinopse: This feature length documentary chronicles the extraordinary life of transgender activist, educator and porn pioneer, Buck Angel. His in-your-face style of activism has audiences outraged by his insistence that he is 'a man... who happens to have a vagina.' Buck faced relentless opposition his entire life yet managed to survive addiction, prostitution, and suicide. It is a moving story of one man's search for self love and acceptance from his family and the world. MR ANGEL is an inspirational story of rare perseverance and an unlikely hero.—Anonymous
